This morning, PSWs, RNs & other health workers in the Niagara-area told me how they’re exhausted & heartbroken because they can’t give residents the time they deserve.   We need to hire more staff now, especially in LTC & make PSW jobs full-time & decently paid. It’s urgent.  https://t.co/eqEHwxKzmT
